doc.field: Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello
Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello
Series II: Bern Dibner Library / CATT
Series II: Bern Dibner Library / CATT

This series contains architectural, administrative, and financial reports and charts regarding the planning, development and construction of Bern Dibner Library and the Center for Advanced Technology in Telecommunications (CATT) at 5 Metrotech Center.
